name: 曾恕銘
objective: 1.展頻和錯誤控制碼簡介2.頻率再使用和細胞概念3.無線電傳播環境4.同通道干擾5.涵蓋6.頻譜效率和容量7.通道模型8.分集9.二代細胞式行動通訊標準
schedule:
1.　　Introduction
2.　　Probability, Statistics, and Traffic Theories
3.　　Mobile Radio Propagation
4.　　Channel Coding and Error Control
5.　　Cellular Concept
6.　　Multiple Radio Access
materials: 1.　　Agrawal, Introduction to Wireless and Mobile Systems, Brooks/Cole, 2nd edition, 2006 (新月東華)
